name: Infected (Josh2000)
description:
A short text adventure game about you as the player searching for food in an abandoned supermarket during a zombie apocalypse. Your decisions will affect the future so choose wisely.

How to Play:

Type "Go" before any action (i.e. Go open the door).

You are able to examine items as well as the area you are in. To do this, simply type "Examine" then the item or area you'd like to look at. (i.e. Examine room).

After you have completed the game, click ALT and TAB to leave the game window.

How to Download & Play:

Click the download button. Once the zip folder has downloaded, extract the file to anywhere you want to on your computer, to do this, right click the zip folder and press Extract All. After you have done this open the folder (which may be called GameBuild2) and then double click on the file titled TextAdventure.

Feedback is appreciated
